wikipedia_page.main: Philip William Ray (1806 – 23 January 1880) was an English cricketer with amateur status. He was associated with Cambridge University and made his first-class debut in 1827. He was educated at Bury St Edmunds Grammar School and Clare College, Cambridge. He became a Church of England priest and was rector of Greensted from 1837 until his death.

response: Philip Ray (born Roy Edgar Cochrane, 1 November 1898 – 11 May 1978) was a British stage, film and television actor. Occasionally credited as Phil Ray, he played numerous and varied supporting roles, particularly in films and on television.
